short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hello World Anime Wallpaper turn new tab with custom HD Hello World background. Hello World Anime background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Hello World Anime wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Customize your Hello World Anime background or set favorites in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your emails and social media profiles.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick navigation to your most visited sites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for rapid access.
10. Direct access to Google applications.
11. Explore additional themes easily.
12. Share content effortlessly to social media.
13. Download wallpapers directly from the new tab.
14. One-click access to games.
15. Activate engaging animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks in your new Hello World Anime tab.
